title: phiresky's blog
description: About my personal projects and other stuff

items.title: Creating a blog
items.summary: Hello World! I finally decided to make a blog to put my ramblings and projects. After some deliberation I settled on using next.js, so I can use React+TypeScript, don't need a server and the website is accessible without JS enabled. The content is written as markdown, though I'm adding some neat...

items.title: rga: ripgrep, but also search in PDFs, E-Books, Office documents, zip, tar.gz, etc.
items.summary: rga is a line-oriented search tool that allows you to look for a regex in a multitude of file types. rga wraps the awesome ripgrep and enables it to search in pdf, docx, sqlite, jpg, zip, tar.\*, movie subtitles (mkv, mp4), etc. github repo Linux build status Crates.io fearless concurrency Examples ...
